item.title: Berklee College of Music
item.description: Founded on the revolutionary principle that the best way to prepare students for careers in music was through the study and practice of contemporary music. For over half a century, the college has evolved constantly to reflect the state of the art of music and the music business. With over a dozen performance and nonperformance majors, a diverse and talented student body representing over 70 countries, and a music industry 'who's who' of alumni, Berklee is the world's premier learning lab for the music of today and tomorrow.
